item.title: ~~ teleblocking varrock HELP~~
item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
item.description:
@Projext wrote:

Well the first one is a command by the looks of it, ::teleto (location) (height level), and the second one is where you click the spell in the magic book, so it’s up to you.

            case 4140:
            if (teleblock == true) {
                 sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); 
            } else { 
                 teleportToX = 3210;
                 teleportToY = 3424;
                 sendMessage("You teleport to Varrock!");
            }
            break;

Woudl be the spellbook teleport button.

Read full topic

item.title: ~~ teleblocking varrock HELP~~
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok heres the code for teleblocking

if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else {

ok in client.java there 2 different codes i can put them in but i dont know which one and exactly where to put it. every time i try to put it in i get 100 errors.

do i put it in here

[code] public void TeleTo(String s, int level) {
teleX = absX;
teleY = absY;
newheightLevel = heightLevel;
checkwildy();
if (teleblock == false && actionTimer <= 7) {
if (s == “Varrock”) {
teleX = 3210;
teleY = 3424;
addSkillXP((5 * playerLevel[6]), 6);
newheightLevel = 0;
}

        if (s == "Falador") {
            teleX = 2964;
            teleY = 3378;
            addSkillXP((5 * playerLevel[6]), 6);
            newheightLevel = 0;
         
        }

[/code]

or this one

case 4140: teleportToX = 3210; teleportToY = 3424; sendMessage("You teleport to Varrock!"); break; case 4143: teleportToX = 3222; teleportToY = 3218; sendMessage("You teleport to Lumbridge!"); break;

feel free to edit them
